description:
An instant classic. This water-resistant daypack can handle cross-campus sprints and the flow of the weekend. Fjallraven fabric is hardwearing and durable, and it's water-resistant in case of a surprise shower. Subtle leather trim adds a touch of style, while padded shoulder straps make it easier to haul textbooks. A dedicated compartment cradles your laptop, while a huge main compartment holds everything else your day requires – workout clothes, lunch, wallet, keys and more.

  • Made from Fjallraven's G-1000 Eco fabric, a super-durable blend of recycled polyester and organically grown cotton with a dense weave
  • Impregnated with Fjallraven's Greenland wax treatment for excellent water resistance. To make it waterproof, apply additional wax (sold separately)
  • Classic leather trims add style
  • Comfortable, padded shoulder straps and breathable Airmesh back panel
  • Access the large main compartment via the wide clamshell zip
  • Front zippered organizer panel has internal mesh pockets
  • Dedicated padded compartment holds laptops up to 15in
  • 2 side pockets hold water bottles or an umbrella
  • Fleece-lined pocket protects your phone or sunglasses
name: Fjallraven Raven 28 Daypack - Unisex
